vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.22.1;
father of: Jedidah (H3040)
§ Adaiah = "Jehovah has adorned Himself"
1) maternal grandfather of king Josiah of Judah and native of Boscath in the lowlands of Judah
2) a Gershonite Levite and ancestor of Asaph
3) a Benjamite, son of Shimhi
4) a priest, son of Jehoram
5) ancestor of Maaseiah, one of the captains who supported Jehoiada
6) a descendant of Bani who had a foreign wife in the time of Ezra
7) a descendant of another Bani who had a foreign wife in the time of Ezra
8) a descendant of Pharez of the tribe of Judah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   padre de Jedidá, esposa de Amón, rey de Judá; (b)   hijo de Adaías; ancestro de Asaf; tribu de Leví; (c)   hijo de Simí; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín; (d)   hijo de Jeroham; sacerdote; post exílico; (e)   varios hombres; casados con esposas extranjeras; post exílico; (f)   hijo de Joiarib; tribu de Judá; post exílico; (g)   hijo de Jeroham; sacerdote; post exílico \padre de Maaseías, oficial, en tiempos de la reina Atalía
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞大雅 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華已榮耀了祂自己"
1) 猶大王約西亞的外祖父, 是位猶大低地的波斯加地的人 (王下 22:1)
2) 一位歌轄的利未人, 是亞薩的祖先 (代上 6:41)
3) 便雅憫人示每的兒子之一 (代上 8:21)
4) 耶羅罕的兒子, 一位祭司 (代上 9:12;尼 11:12)
5) 瑪西雅的先人, 瑪西雅是支持耶何耶大的軍長之一 (代下 23:1)
6) 巴尼的子孫之一, 以斯拉時代的人, 他曾娶了一外邦女子為妻 (拉 10:29)
7) 另一位巴尼的子孫之一, 以斯拉時代的人, 他曾娶了一外邦女子為妻 (拉 10:39)
8) 猶大支派的法勒斯的子孫之一 (尼 11:5)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚大雅 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华已荣耀了祂自己"
1) 犹大王约西亚的外祖父, 是位犹大低地的波斯加地的人 (王下 22:1)
2) 一位歌辖的利未人, 是亚萨的祖先 (代上 6:41)
3) 便雅悯人示每的儿子之一 (代上 8:21)
4) 耶罗罕的儿子, 一位祭司 (代上 9:12;尼 11:12)
5) 玛西雅的先人, 玛西雅是支持耶何耶大的军长之一 (代下 23:1)
6) 巴尼的子孙之一, 以斯拉时代的人, 他曾娶了一外邦女子为妻 (拉 10:29)
7) 另一位巴尼的子孙之一, 以斯拉时代的人, 他曾娶了一外邦女子为妻 (拉 10:39)
8) 犹大支派的法勒斯的子孙之一 (尼 11:5)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.21;
son of: Shimei (H8096N);
brother of: Jakim (H3356), Zichri (H2147H), Zabdi (H2067H), Elienai (H0462), Zillethai (H6769), Eliel (H0447H), Beraiah (H1256) and Shimrath (H8119)
§ Adaiah = "Jehovah has adorned Himself"
1) maternal grandfather of king Josiah of Judah and native of Boscath in the lowlands of Judah
2) a Gershonite Levite and ancestor of Asaph
3) a Benjamite, son of Shimhi
4) a priest, son of Jehoram
5) ancestor of Maaseiah, one of the captains who supported Jehoiada
6) a descendant of Bani who had a foreign wife in the time of Ezra
7) a descendant of another Bani who had a foreign wife in the time of Ezra
8) a descendant of Pharez of the tribe of Judah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.6.21;
son of: Joah (H3098H);
father of: Zerah (H2226J); also called Adaiah at 1Ch.6.41;
Another name of id.do (עִדּוֹ "Iddo" H5714H)
§ Adaiah = "Jehovah has adorned Himself"
1) maternal grandfather of king Josiah of Judah and native of Boscath in the lowlands of Judah
2) a Gershonite Levite and ancestor of Asaph
3) a Benjamite, son of Shimhi
4) a priest, son of Jehoram
5) ancestor of Maaseiah, one of the captains who supported Jehoiada
6) a descendant of Bani who had a foreign wife in the time of Ezra
7) a descendant of another Bani who had a foreign wife in the time of Ezra
8) a descendant of Pharez of the tribe of Judah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.12.4
Another name of id.do (עִדּוֹא ,עִדּוֹ "Iddo" H5714K)
§ Adaiah = "Jehovah has adorned Himself"
1) maternal grandfather of king Josiah of Judah and native of Boscath in the lowlands of Judah
2) a Gershonite Levite and ancestor of Asaph
3) a Benjamite, son of Shimhi
4) a priest, son of Jehoram
5) ancestor of Maaseiah, one of the captains who supported Jehoiada
6) a descendant of Bani who had a foreign wife in the time of Ezra
7) a descendant of another Bani who had a foreign wife in the time of Ezra
8) a descendant of Pharez of the tribe of Judah
